Reception given by Vietnamese charge d'affaires ad interim 
    Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Tran Van Hieu, Vietnamese charge d'affaires ad interim in Pyongyang, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps yesterday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the People's Army of Vietnam and the New Year Juche 91 (2002).
 Invited were lieutenant general Han Ung Man and other generals and officers of the Korean People's Army.    
 Speeches were made.
